experiences.title: Research Student
experiences.subtitle: The Hospital for Sick Children (SickKids)
workDescription: Created and deployed **Docker** and **Singularity** containers to package and distribute bioinformatics tools and custom **Python** scripts, also updated references of FV to GRCh38 and GENCODE V46.

Optimized **HPC/HPF** job submissions and leveraged **Cromwell** to improve task scheduling, resulting in a significantly better turnaround time of the FV pipeline from **7 days** to running in **under 1 day**.

Tested against SeraSeq V3 and V4 samples and achieved **100% sensitivity**, exceeding the original pipeline's performance and even identifying fusions, such as TMPRSS2-ERG, that the original pipeline could never find.

experiences.title: Summer Research Student
experiences.subtitle: The Hospital for Sick Children (SickKids)
workDescription: Implemented new functionality to the Shlien Lab Gene Expression (GEX) pipeline to perform **STAR** alignment and **Arriba** fusion calling, and received positive comments from fellow lab members that use the GEX pipeline.

Overhauled the Shlien Lab/Clinical Fusion Validator (FV) pipeline, converting **Perl** code to **WDL** and **Python** using knowledge of cancer, gene fusions and Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data.
Reformed FV by eliminating unnecessary logic to streamline processes, redesigning algorithms to enhance performance, and substituting inefficient logic with faster alternatives to improve throughput.

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Deployed **Docker** containers and cloud pipelines for a document reverse engineering AI model in **AWS Lambda** with data stored and queried via **DynamoDB** databases on a training dataset of **75,000+ diverse documents**.
Constructed and deployed CI/CD pipelines through **CircleCI** for the AI model, enhancing system reliability by **40%** and reducing release downtime by **25%**.
Enhanced user query response times to under **2 seconds** by developing a **React** user interface to generate insurance documents from dynamic tags and advanced filters.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Resolution Life
workDescription: Led the development of a document reverse engineering AI model using NLP techniques in **spaCy** and **NLTK**, resulting in a **75%** reduction in document processing time and saving **$1,000,000+** in acquisition costs.
Trained the model using Machine Learning libraries, **PyTorch** and **TensorFlow**, on the data.
Generalized the model to reproduce more than just insurance documents, so that it could be applied to other fields of study and sold as a microservice resulting in **$10,000+** of additional revenue.

Launched a comprehensive test suite utilizing **Pytest** and other testing tools to perform unit, integration and system testing to automate model evaluation, enhancing document regeneration accuracy by over **90%**.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: The Canadian Automobile Association (CAA)
workDescription: Created a conversational AI chatbot using **Google Dialogflow** to answer questions for towing facilities and CAA employees, which reduced the time and need to read manuals by over **50%**.

Designed and maintained informative webpages using **JavaScript** and **React** to provide CAA employees and towing facility personnel across **100+ teams** with up-to-date information on Gen 2 features and updates.

Established a centralized knowledge base using **Wiki.js** to manage **1000+ software manuals**, streamlining access through tags and advanced search filters while providing responses within **1 second**.

experiences.title: Data Engineer
experiences.subtitle: The Canadian Automobile Association (CAA)
workDescription: Engineered dynamic algorithms leveraging **Reverse Geocoding API** data and predictive analysis in **Python** to dispatch real-time messages to towing facilities through **Twilio**, thereby reducing service times by over **25%**.

Integrated the algorithms into production using **APIs**, **Python**, and **Power BI**, which facilitated real-time dispatching based on proximity and predicated demand to improve customer satisfaction rates by **40%**.

Automated ETL processes and optimized data workflows via **Apache Airflow**, which resulted in a **15%** reduction in latency and significantly improved the reliability of data delivery for real-time analytics.
